comments.body: Can we put the logic of turning `StreamingRelation/StreamingRelationV2` to `StreamingDataSourceV2Relation` in the new rule as well?

Actually, I'm following this direction now based on this PR. I plan to move all the logic of generating `logicalPlan` in both MicroBatchExcecution and ContinuousExecution. The patch is still in development, and some issues (like the queryExecutionThread assertion) are investigating. Maybe we can split this task into another PR. WDYT?
